item.title: Mysql Basic
item.description: Add and Grand user 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 CREATE DATABASE database_name; CREATE USER 'newuser'@'10.8.0.5' IDENTIFIED BY 'user_password'; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON database_name.* TO 'database_user'@'localhost'; Alter user password 1 alter user 'username'@'localhost' identified by 'user_password'; Drop user 1 drop user 'user'@'localhost';
